Documentation.UserDocu: This object allows to computation of the along wind spectrum using the Davenport wind spectrum

computeAlongWindAutoSpectrum(frequency, shearVelocity, meanSpeed10 = 30) frequency = the frequency value for which the spectrum will be calculated shearVelocity = the shear velocity of the flow meanSpeed10 = a mean wind speed taken at a height equal to 10 meter above sea level.
